main event: A round object the size of a pea was observed, which then broke into several pieces and created a long trail in the sky before burning out instantly.
interesting points: The object was observed from Tricity Airport control tower and by a highway patrol officer in Bristol, Tennessee., The sighting lasted approximately 10 seconds., The object appeared to have a glow and possess a high speed of movement., It was assessed that the sighting could be a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomenon., Weather conditions during the sighting included high thin scattered clouds with good visibility.
witness description: Civilian observers at Tricity Airport and a highway patrol officer in Bristol.
